about_the_game:
Clean Corps is a speed based First Person Shooter where you play as a trash collecting superhero!

Shoot enemies and use your vacuum arm to clean up beaches, sewers, and more all while trying to get the best time on each level!

Features:

  • Easy to Understand Gameplay: run, jump, slide, and vacuum your way to victory!
  • Tons of levels with interesting mechanics
  • Multiple boss fights against trash-slinging foes
  • Short and sweet length with plenty of bonus content after the main story!

Background:

This game was originally made for the George Mason Progress@Play2023 competition, in which it won third place! Since then the game has had a top to bottom overhaul with multiple features being added.

New Features:

  • You can now Slide! Sliding increases your speed but you can also jump out of a slide for increased height!
  • Completely redesigned levels!
  • Triple the amount of levels and bosses!
  • Completely overhauled visuals!
  • New soundtrack!

name: Clean Corps

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: One that plays sound. That you can hear. With your ear holes.

short_description: Clean Corps is a first person shooter that sees you take the role of a trash collecting superhero created by a child to inspire others to help clean his local beach! Use your vacuum arm to shoot enemies and suck up garbage to clear each level as fast as you can and take out the trash!
